data.actual_result: The sound will be played through the speaker for a split second after disconnecting
data.expected_result: It just disconnects you from the voice channel and nothing else happens
data.short_description: Disconnecting from a voice channel when you have "Use speaker" option disabled will play the sound through the speaker for a split second
data.steps_to_repro: - Make sure you have the "Use speaker" option **disabled** in your voice settings - Connect to any voice channel, and either have someone else make noise or play a song using a music bot - Disconnect from the voice channel
